basics.name: Gavin Ng
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering: Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.summary: Mentor for the Maryknoll Highschool Robotics Team
highlights: Teaching key technical skills like programming, wiring, and using tools.
Teaching soft skills like teamwork, communication, and problem solving.

work.company: Native Hawaiian Science & Engineering Mentorship Program (NHSEMP)
work.summary: Summer mentor at the University of Hawaii on behalf of the University of Hawaii Drone Technologies Lab.
highlights: Assigned lab relevant projects and teaching skills to accomplish them.
List of skills that needed to be taught: 3D modelling and printing, programming, and soldering.

volunteer.summary: Lead for the image processing subsystem
highlights: Making algorithms to process images from the drone's camera to detect and classify objects of interest.
Organize team to accomplish tasks and meet deadlines.

awards.title: Hawaii Regional Finalists
awards.summary: My team got 2nd place at the Hawaii Regional.
